EmailTemplate.name: Reminder: Ovum Layered Tech webinar.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us tomorrow – VMTurbo webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
There are still a few spots left for tomorrow's webinar! VMTurbo is hosting an expert discussion. Get an industry analyst's and a cloud service provider's point of view regarding "Overcoming Key Challenges in Operating Cloud Environments".
Register now! <https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/393344606>
DATE: Tuesday, January 22, 2103 TIME: 12 pm ET PRESENTERS: Kevin Van Mondfrans from Layered Tech & Roy Illsley from Ovum
Learn more. <https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/393344606>
We hope you will join us!
- The VMTurbo Team
